lead_paragraph: A former Utah attorney general pleaded not guilty Monday to 13 charges of bribery and other crimes after prosecutors said he took beach vacations and used a luxury houseboat from executives in trouble with regulators.

headline.main: Utah: Ex-Attorney General Pleads Not Guilty to Bribery Charges
headline.print_headline: Utah: Ex-Attorney General Pleads Not Guilty To Bribery Charges

snippet: A former Utah attorney general pleaded not guilty Monday to 13 charges of bribery and other crimes after prosecutors said he took beach vacations and used a luxury houseboat from executives in trouble with regulators.
